DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate effect ( Platelet Rich Fibrin ) PRF application implant osseointegration early phase healing .
DOC.brief_title: An Invivo Study Compare Stability Dental Implants With Without Platelet Rich Fibrin Application
DOC.detailed_description: Objectives : Achieving accelerate implant osseointegration could provide immediate early loading implant . Platelet-rich fibrin ( PRF ) widely use accelerate soft hard tissue heal . Activated platelet PRF release growth factor result cellular proliferation , collagen synthesis osteoid production . The aim study compare stability dental implant insert one-stage surgical protocol without PRF application . Design : Non-randomized , Active Controlled Trial . Material Methods : Twenty healthy patient ( n=10 test group , n= control group ) adequate alveolar bone , 2 adjacent miss teeth , extract least 6 month ago include study . Minimum two taper implant ( Ankylosis , DentsplyFriadent ) place patient . After surgical preparation implant socket , PRF prepare preoperatively place randomly one socket ( PRF+ ) . Acellular plasma portion PRF use wet implant place PRF-coated socket . Resonance frequency measurement make Osstell ISQ placement implant , 1 week one month postoperatively . Key Words : Dental implant stability , Platelet Rich Fibrin , Resonance frequency analysis
DOC.criteria: The absence lesion oral cavity , sufficient residual bone volume receive two adjacent implant â‰¥3.5 mm diameter 11.0 mm length , extract least 6 month ago . Insufficient bone volume Parafunctional habit Smoking 10 cigarette per day Excessive consumption alcohol Localized radiotherapy oral cavity Antitumor chemotherapy Liver , blood , kidney disease Immunosuppression Current corticosteroid bisphosphonate use Pregnancy Mucocutaneous diseases involve oral cavity Poor oral hygiene
